meanings.definition: A loose, lightweight robe worn informally at home.
meanings.sent1: She wore her comfortable housecoats every evening.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new housecoat to relax in after work.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the housecoat was a new type of blanket.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of housecoats was a rainbow of colors.
meanings.sent5: The soft fabric of the housecoat felt like a gentle hug.

meanings.sent1: She housecoats her guests to make them feel at home.
meanings.sent2: He housecoats the visitors with freshly washed robes.
meanings.sent3: The hotel staff housecoats the rooms with cozy robes.
meanings.sent4: The mother housecoats her children with warm blankets.
meanings.sent5: The kind gesture of housecoating the guests was appreciated.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a housecoat.
meanings.sent1: She chose the housecoat fabric for the special event.
meanings.sent2: The housecoat design was elegant and comfortable.
meanings.sent3: The housecoat party was a fun and cozy gathering.
meanings.sent4: The housecoat style reflected her relaxed personality.
meanings.sent5: The housecoat material was soft and luxurious to the touch.
